SELECT role.*, imr.member_id AS user_id FROM iam_role role LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr ON role.id = imr.role_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{sourceId} AND imr.source_type = #{sourceType} AND imr.member_id IN
#{userId}

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id WHERE ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND il.`name` = #{labelName}

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id
hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND il.name = #{labelName} AND il.type = 'ROLE'
AND ir.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{param.name}), '%')

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_member_role imr LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr on hlr.data_id = ir.id LEFT JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = hlr.label_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{tenantId} AND imr.member_id = 1 AND hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND il.name = 'TENANT_ADMIN' OR ir.`code` = 'role/organization/default/administrator'

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT 0 AS id, 'Choerodon' AS name, 'Choerodon' AS code, 1 AS is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, 'site' as image_url, null AS proj_name, 0 as sort FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'site' AND imr.member_id = #{userId}
AND 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
GROUP BY imr.source_type
UNION
SELECT fo.tenant_id AS id, fo.tenant_name AS name, fo.tenant_num AS code, fo.enabled_flag AS is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, 'organization' as image_url, null AS proj_name, 1 as sort FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id inner join hiam_label_rel hlr on (hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} and hlr.data_id = ir.id) inner join iam_label il on il.id = hlr.label_id INNER JOIN hpfm_tenant fo ON imr.source_id = fo.tenant_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND fo.enabled_flag = 1 AND il.name = 'TENANT_ROLE'
AND fo.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fo.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
group by fo.tenant_id
UNION
SELECT fp.id, CONCAT(fo.tenant_name, CONCAT(' / ', fp.name)) AS name, fp.code, fp.is_enabled, 'project' as source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, fp.image_url, fp.name AS proj_name, 2 as sort FROM iam_member_role imr inner join fd_project_permission fpu on fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id INNER JOIN fd_project fp ON fpu.PROJECT_ID = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id inner join hiam_label_rel hlr on (hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND hlr.data_id = ir.id) inner join iam_label il on il.id = hlr.label_id INNER JOIN hpfm_tenant fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.tenant_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND fp.is_enabled = 1 AND il.name = 'PROJECT_ROLE'
AND fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND (fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fo.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%'))
group by fp.id
) user_role ORDER BY sort asc

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id WHERE ir.h_tenant_id = #{organizationId} AND hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' AND il.`name` = 'TENANT_ADMIN' AND ir.id not in (SELECT ir.id FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id WHERE ir.h_tenant_id = #{organizationId} AND hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' AND il.`name` = 'TENANT_ROLE_TPL')
SELECT il.* FROM hiam_label_rel hlr JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = hlr.label_id WHERE hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' AND hlr.data_id = #{roleId}

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id INNER JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND data_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = hlr.label_id INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id
imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id =#{userId} AND fpu.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND il.name = 'PROJECT_ROLE'
group by ir.id

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id
hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND il.type = 'ROLE' AND il.name = #{labelName}

SELECT DISTINCT il. NAME FROM iam_label il JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.member_id = #{userId} JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id AND ir.fd_level = 'organization' AND ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON hlr.data_id = ir.id AND hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' WHERE il.id = hlr.label_id AND il.`name` LIKE concat(concat('%', 'TENANT'), '%')

SELECT imr.id member_role_id, ir.id, ir. CODE AS CODE, ir.fd_level, irt. NAME AS NAME, ir.h_tenant_id, ir.h_parent_role_assign_level, ir.h_parent_role_assign_level_val, imr.start_date_active, imr.end_date_active FROM iam_member_role imr JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id JOIN iam_role_tl irt ON ( ir.id = irt.id AND irt.lang = #{lang} ) JOIN fd_project_permission fpp ON fpp.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id AND fpp.project_id = #{projectId} WHERE imr.member_id = #{clientId} AND imr.member_type = 'client' AND ir.is_enabled = 1 AND ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId}
and irt.name LIKE #{nameLike}

SELECT ir.id FROM iam_role ir JOIN iam_user iu ON iu.id = #{userId} JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.role_id = ir.id AND imr.member_id = iu.id AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT iu.* FROM iam_user iu JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.`code` = 'role/site/default/auditor' JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.member_id = iu.id AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.role_id = ir.id
